caption.p: Characteristics of collection site of selected strains K-192 (a), K-340 (b), K-362 (c), K-522 (d), K-525 (e) from the extreme ecosystems of Kazakhstan. a. Almaty region, Balkhash district, Aquatic habitat, swamp ecosystem, mud; b. Almaty region, Balkhash district, Terrestrial habitat, clay desert ecosystem, takyr-type saline soils; c. Kostanay region, Mendykara district, Terrestrial habitat, steppe ecosystem, sor solonchak; d. Kostanay region, Amankaragai, Terrestrial habitat, steppe pinewood ecosystem, sor solonchak; e. Kostanay region, Amankaragai, Terrestrial habitat, steppe pinewood ecosystem, sor solonchak.
